GV06vaitss_u:2226: nikīrya tubhyam abhya āsaṃ gīḥ kośvoṣyaur yadā gira idaṃ madhu //
GV06vaitss_u:2227: yadā rāghaṭī varado vyāghraṃ maṅgīradāsa gauḥ /
GV06vaitss_u:2228: janaḥ sa bhadram edhati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ [cf. ĀpŚS 21.20.3 etc.]) iti // (6.4.10) (34.10) (
GV06vaitss_u:2251: (6.4.18) (34.18) sa yadā brāhmaṇadhanaṃ gṛhṇāti tad yajamāno niṣkrīṇāti // (6.4.19) (34.19) (
GV06vaitss_u:2324: (7.1.22) (36.22) pāriplavākhyānāya dakṣiṇena vediṃ hiraṇmayeṣv āsaneṣu upaviśanti //
GV06vaitss_u:2333: saṃ tvāṃ gandharvāḥ sam u yuñjantv āpo nadyoḥ sāṃvaidye parivatsarāya /
GV06vaitss_u:2334: ye tvā rakṣanti sadam apramādaṃ tebhya āyuḥ savitā bodhi gopāya [-]) iti // (7.1.28) (36.28) (
GV06vaitss_u:2340: svargeṇa lokena saṃprorṇuvāthām adhāma sakthyor ava gudaṃ dhehi /
GV06vaitss_u:2341: arvāñcam añjim ā bhara yat strīṇāṃ jīvabhojanam [cf. VSM 23.20 + TS 7.4.19.1]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2343: ūrdhvām enām ucchrayatād girau bhāraṃ harann iva /
GV06vaitss_u:2344: athāsyai madhyam edhatu śīte vāte punann iva [VSM 23.26-27]) iti // (7.1.32) (36.32) (
GV06vaitss_u:2350: pṛcchāmi tvā citaye devasakha yadi tvaṃ tatra manasā jagantha /
GV06vaitss_u:2351: keṣu viṣṇus triṣu padeṣu jiṣṇuḥ keṣv idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa [VSM 23.49]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2353: pañcasv antaḥ puruṣa āviveśa tāny antaḥ puruṣa ārpitāni /
GV06vaitss_u:2354: etat tvātra pratimanvāno asmi na yajñapā bhavasy uttaro mat [VSM 23.52]) //
GV06vaitss_u:2355: (na tvaṃ paro 'varo man na pūrvaḥ kim aṅga vā matiman kṣama tena /
GV06vaitss_u:2356: śikṣeṇyāṃ vadasi vācam enāṃ na mayā tvaṃ saṃsamako bhavāsi [-]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2358: pṛcchāmi tvā param antaṃ pṛthivyāḥ [9.10.13]) iti /
GV06vaitss_u:2365: (7.2.8) (37.8) pratyṛtu ṣaṭ paśava āgneyā aindrā mārutā maitrāvaruṇā aindrāvaruṇā āgnāvaiṣṇavā iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2369: (7.2.11-12) (37.11-12) caitryāḥ purastād varadānānta iṣṭayo 'gnaye kāmāya dātre pathikṛte // (7.2.13) (37.13) (
GV06vaitss_u:2374: kasmai sahasraṃ śatāśvaṃ svaṃ jñātibhyo dadyām /
GV06vaitss_u:2377: (7.2.15) (37.15) yadi brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vā pratipadyeta siddhaṃ karmety ācakṣate //
GV06vaitss_u:2378: (7.2.16) (37.16) na cet pratipadyeta nediṣṭhaṃ sapatnaṃ vijitya tena yajeta //
GV06vaitss_u:2380: (7.2.18) (37.18) yasya strī saṃbhāṣeta tasya sarvasvam ādāya tām abrāhmaṇīṃ haniṣya ity uccaiḥ śrāvayet //
GV06vaitss_u:2386: (7.2.20) (37.20) saṃvatsaram iṣṭayaḥ pathyāyai svastaye adityā anumataye //
GV06vaitss_u:2410: PS 19.23.4-6]) (vāta ā vātu [sakala at KauśS 117.4, PS 19.46.7-9]) iti /
GV06vaitss_u:2417: yan na idaṃ pitṛbhiḥ [sakala at KauśS 88.29,
GV06vaitss_u:2420: gāvo yavaṃ prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāś carantīḥ /
GV06vaitss_u:2421: havā idaryo abhitaḥ samāyan kiyad āsu svapatiś chandayāte [ṚV 10.27.8])
GV06vaitss_u:2424: yasyānakṣā duhitā jātvāsa kas tāṃ vidvā;
GV06vaitss_u:2426: kataro meniṃ prati taṃ muñcāte ya īṃ vahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt [ṚV 10.27.11]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2433: (7.3.11) (38.11) ahāny agniṣṭud indrastut sūryastud vaiśvadevastut pauruṣamedhikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pañcamaṃ vājapeyo 'ptoryāmā //
GV06vaitss_u:2492: tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham [20.107.4-6]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2505: (8.2.1) (40.1) virāji bhūmistome vanaspatisave tviṣyapacityor indrāgnyoḥ stoma indrāgnyoḥ kulāya (
GV06vaitss_u:2524: tvaṃ na indrā bhara [20.108]) iti ca /
GV06vaitss_u:2529: aham id dhi pituṣ pari [20.115]) iti ca //
GV06vaitss_u:2539: pibā somam indra mandatu tvā [20.117]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2541: abhi pra gopatiṃ girā [20.22.4-6]) iti ca //
GV06vaitss_u:2547: mā cid anyad vi śaṃsata [20.85.1-2]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2551: indra kratuṃ na ā bhara [20.79]) iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2580: evā hy asi vīrayuḥ [20.60.1-3]) ity ukthe //
GV06vaitss_u:2642: yad indra prāg apāg udak [20.120]) iti //

GV06vaitss_u:2735: (8.5.32) (43.32) yāmaḥ śukahariḥ śuṇṭho vānāmayakāmasya pitṛlokakāmasya ca //
GV06vaitss_u:2750: (8.5.46) (43.46) ya imau kalpāv adhīte ya u caivaṃ veda tena sarvaiḥ kratubhir iṣṭaṃ bhavati sarvāṃś ca kāmān āpnoti //
GV06vaitss_u:2751: (8.5.47) (43.47) athāpy udāharanti yathā yaṣṭus tathādhyetur eṣā brāhmī pratiśrutir eṣā brāhmī pratiśrutir iti //
